title: "Your Shop" not working !!!
body: The options in "Your Shop" can't be activated ! I want to buy the package of a Lee and his Traditional skin. It keeps telling me an unexpected error occurred. This is a real problem. Solve it pls, Riot.

replies.body: It is broken for me as well, when i try to pick up my lucian and his project skin for -70% off i encounter an unexpected error. It is really annoying because i only bought rp to get this offer.

Hey there,

From what I can find, this occurs when you're attempting to purchase a champion through your personalised discounts. Do you own the champ whose skin you're trying to purchase?
i dont own the Lee Sin, but it says the package is included. 560RP for a Lee and the skin
